info.name: Businesses API Tests
info.description: A simple API for a Yelp-like application.

item.name: Fetch data for a specific business.

request.description: Returns complete data for a the business specified by `businessId`.

response.name: Success
response.body:
{
 "ownerId": 16,
 "name": "American Dream Pizza",
 "address": "2525 NW Monroe Ave.",
 "city": "Corvallis",
 "state": "OR",
 "zip": "97330",
 "phone": "541-757-1713",
 "category": "Restaurant",
 "subcategory": "Pizza",
 "website": "http://adpizza.com",
 "email": "brian@adpizza.com",
 "reviews": [
  {
   "userId": 7,
   "businessId": 3,
   "dollars": 3,
   "stars": 5,
   "review": "Great produce!"
  },
  {
   "userId": 7,
   "businessId": 3,
   "dollars": 3,
   "stars": 5,
   "review": "Great produce!"
  }
 ],
 "photos": [
  {
   "userId": 7,
   "businessId": 3,
   "caption": "Kale!"
  },
  {
   "userId": 7,
   "businessId": 3,
   "caption": "Kale!"
  }
 ]
}

item.name: Update data for a specific business.

body.raw:
{
	"ownerId": 7,
	"name": "Allan's Coffee & Tea",
	"address": "2541 NW Monroe Ave.",
	"city": "Corvallis",
	"state": "OR",
	"zip": "97330",
	"phone": "541-757-0828",
	"category": "Restaurant",
	"subcategory": "Coffee Shop",
	"website": "https://www.allanscoffee.com/"
}

request.description: Replaces the data for the business specified by `businessId`.

item.name: Remove a specific business from the database.

request.description: Completely removes the data for the business specified by `businessId`.

query.description: Specifies a specific page of businesses to request.

request.description: Returns a paginated list of businesses.

response.name: Success

request.description: Creates a new business with specified data and adds it to the application's database.

item.name: Fetch data for a specific photo.

request.description: Returns complete data for a the photo specified by `photoID`.

item.name: Update data for a specific photo.

request.description: Replaces the data for the photo specified by `photo`.

response.name: The request body was either not present or did not contain all of the required fields.
The request tried to change the `userId` or the `businessId` for a photo.  Once a photo is created, these cannot be changed.

item.name: Remove a specific photo from the database.

request.description: Completely removes the data for the photo specified by `photoID`.
Creates a new photo with specified data and adds it to the application's database.

response.name: The request body was either not present or did not contain all of the required fields.

item.name: Fetch data for a specific review.

request.description: Returns complete data for a the review specified by `reviewID`.

item.name: Update data for a specific review.

body.raw:
{
    "userId": 25,
    "businessId": 2,
    "dollars": 1,
    "stars": 5,
    "review": "How many fasteners can one room hold?"
}

request.description: Replaces the data for the review specified by `review`.

response.name: The request tried to change the `userId` or the `businessId` for a review.  Once a review is created, these cannot be changed.
The request body was either not present or did not contain all of the required fields.

item.name: Remove a specific review from the database.

request.description: Completely removes the data for the review specified by `reviewID`.
Creates a new review with specified data and adds it to the application's database.

response.name: The specified user has already posted a review for the specified business.  A given user may only post one review for a given business.
The request body was either not present or did not contain all of the required fields.

request.description: Returns a list of all of the businesses owned by the user specified by `userId`.

response.name: Success

request.description: Returns a list of all of the photos posted by the user specified by `userId`.
Returns a list of all of the reviews written by the user specified by `userId`.
